datasetIds.title: Dataset IDs
datasetIds.description: Datasets that should be deduplicated and merged

fields.title: Fields for dedup
fields.description: Fields whose combination should be unique for the item to be considered unique

outputUniques.title: Output uniques
outputUniques.description: If true, will also push unique items into new dataset.

outputDuplicates.title: Output duplicates
outputDuplicates.description: If true, will also push duplicate items into new dataset. Adds a 'duplicationKey' field to each item. Useful for analysis.

outputDatasetId.title: Output dataset ID (optional)
outputDatasetId.description: Optionally can push into non-default dataset.

parallelLoads.title: Parallel loads
parallelLoads.description: Datasets can be loaded in parallel batches to speed things up if needed.

uploadSleepMs.title: Upload sleep ms
uploadSleepMs.description: How long it should wait between each batch when uploading. Useful to not overload Apify API.

uploadBatchSize.title: Upload batch size
uploadBatchSize.description: How many items it should upload in one pushData call. Useful to not overload Apify API.
